title: Ecolab 3Q Adjusted EPS In Line With Analysts' Estimates
text:
By Michael Dabaie

Ecolab Inc. (ECL) reported third-quarter adjusted earnings in line with analysts' estimates.

The water, hygiene and energy technologies and services company reported third-quarter earnings of $464.2 million, or $1.59 a share, up from $435.4 million, or $1.48 a share, a year earlier.

Adjusted EPS was $1.71, up from $1.53 in the year-ago period and in-line with FactSet consensus.

Sales were $3.82 billion, up from $3.75 billion in the year ago. FactSet consensus was for $3.9 billion.

Shares were down about 2% to $188 in premarket trade.

The company narrowed its 2019 adjusted EPS forecast to $5.80 to $5.90, from the previous $5.80 to $6.00 range.

Write to Michael Dabaie at michael.dabaie@wsj.com

(END) Dow Jones Newswires

October 29, 2019 09:39 ET (13:39 GMT)
